attributes.action: PLEASE REMOVE  THERESA  MAY FROM PARLIMENT SHE CLAIMS THAT  CHILD SEX ABUSERS SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO ADOPT .... WE THE PEOPLE OF THIS COUNTRY THE PEO  T
attributes.additional_details: Theresa may claims that child sex abusers should have the right to adopt or it will become a breech of the predators human rights ..well we the people of this country want her removed from having any say on any issue that invovles children. child abusers  DO NOT CHANGE therefore the adopted child will be abused....sex offenders should not be allowed to adopt please remove Theresa may from having anything to do with such a  dreadful idea and the chance of another childs life taken
